BASE_ACTION.ARMY_DESC: Convert base personnel into troops capable of defending your lands and invading enemies'.
BASE_ACTION.ATTACK_LANDS_DESC: Attack enemy lands and bases within this structure's attack radius.
BASE_ACTION.BUTTON_STORAGE_DESC: Transfer stored items into your inventory.
BASE_ACTION.NUKE_LANDS_DESC: Perform a nuclear strike against all enemies in the area.
BASE_ACTION.PRODUCE_ITEM_DESC: Manufacture random power-ups or utility items. Only possible to do while you are present on a base.
BASE_ACTION.REMOTE_COLLECT_DESC: Send a member of personnel to collect resources that appeared on captured lands linked to this base.

BUILDING.ASSEMBLY_DESC: Produces random power-ups and utility items enhancing resource collection radius or amounts. Only available when you are present on the same base. Upgrade level determines the number of produced items.
BUILDING.GUARD_TOWER_DESC: Offensive structure capable of attacking enemies close or within your land's borders. Also prevents other players from damaging your lands using "Capture Land".
BUILDING.LAUNCHER_DESC: Stationary weapon capable of attacking nearby lands and damaging their structures.
BUILDING.NUKE_DESC: Allows launching nuclear missiles at your enemies, dealing enormous amount of level damage to lands and structures.
BUILDING.REFINERY_DESC: Infinite source of supplies allowing collection of an amount equal to its upgrade level.
BUILDING.SANDBAG_DESC: Military fortification increasing the defence score of lands outside a base.
BUILDING.SATELLITE_DESC: Enables remote collection of all resources that have appeared on captured lands linked to this base.
BUILDING.WALL_DESC: Increases the defence score of a base.
BUILDING.WAREHOUSE_DESC: Allows storing up to 10 items per level produced by Assembly Plant when you're not around or your inventory is full. You can collect stored items at any point when visiting your base. Please note: stored items are vulnerable to theft if your base cannot defend itself during an attack.
BUILDING.SENTRY_DESC: Automated defence system that has a 1% chance per level to slay one soldier of the invading army each round. Extra dice roll is performed for every 100 levels, providing additional chance to slay more enemies. E.g.: a level 140 structure has a 100% chance to slay 1 attacker and 40% chance to slay +1 more.
BUILDING.SOLAR_DESC: Has a 1% chance per level to generate +10 Money whenever resource collection is performed from any station. Extra dice roll is performed for every 100 levels providing additional chance to receive more Money. E.g.: a level 140 structure has a 100% chance to generate +10 Money and 40% chance to generate +10 more.
BUILDING.SILO_DESC: Has a 1% chance per level to generate +1 Supply whenever resource collection is performed from any station. Extra dice roll is performed for every 100 levels providing additional chance to receive more Supplies. E.g.: a level 140 structure has a 100% chance to generate +1 Supply and 40% chance to generate +1 more.
BUILDING.RELAY_DESC: Has a 1% chance per level to generate +1 Personnel whenever resource collection is performed from any station. Extra dice roll is performed for every 100 levels providing additional chance to receive more Personnel. E.g.: a level 140 structure has a 100% chance to generate +1 Personnel and 40% chance to generate +1 more.

ERRORS.GENERIC: Something is wrong... please try again later!
ERRORS.MISSING_BARRACKS: Barracks couldn't be found! Please re-open "My Lands" and try again!
ERRORS.MISSING_ITEM: Item could not be found! Please try again later.
ERRORS.MISSING_PACKAGE: Package not found, please contact support@domination.earth for assistance!
ERRORS.NO_TARGETS: There are no enemy lands within this building's attack radius.
ERRORS.PRODUCTION_COOLDOWN: Item production in progress: please try again later!
ERRORS.TITLE: Oops!
ERRORS.PVP_DISABLED: You cannot attack or be attacked by other players until any of your bases reach level {{level}}. You can only fight non-player enemies (Force of Terror) right now.
ERRORS.PVP_LOW_LEVEL: You cannot attack player {{name}} as their base level isn't high enough for Player vs. Player battles!
ERRORS.RESOURCE_LIMIT: Cannot store any more {{translate_item}}! Upgrade your base level to unlock more storage space!
ERRORS.LAND_ATTACKED: Your land is being invaded by enemy army and cannot use its offensive structures!
ERRORS.PVP_DISABLED_TRADE: Land trade is not possible if one of the players has a base above level {{level}} and the other one hasn't!
ERRORS.OLD_APP: You are using an out of date version of the game. Please download update {{version}} from the Play/App Store for all features to work correctly.
ERRORS.BANNED_ACCOUNT: This account has been blacklisted and cannot be used to play. Please contact support@domination.earth for details.
ERRORS.BANNED_DEVICE: This device has been blacklisted and cannot be used to play. Please contact support@domination.earth for details.
ERRORS.CHEAT_WARNING: Your device has been caught using Fake GPS within the game, which is a violation of our rules. This is your first and only warning, if you continue falsifying your position this account will be disabled.

LAND_SETUP.COLOUR_DESCRIPTION: This colour defines how your land borders will appear for other players.
LAND_SETUP.NAME_DESCRIPTION:
To start playing "Domination: Earth" you need to name your new sovereign state.
This name will be visible to other players.
LAND_SETUP.NAME_TAKEN: This name is unavailable! Please choose another one.
LAND_SETUP.NEW_NAME: You can rename any land for 1 Unobtainium.

LAND_TRADE.CONFIRM_OFFER: Please make sure you are happy with the offered resources, as once the offer is accepted there is no way to return this amount!
LAND_TRADE.MISSING_RESOURCES: Please select at least one resource to offer!
LAND_TRADE.NO_BASE: You do not have a base nearby that can purchase this land.
LAND_TRADE.OFFER_SENT:
Offer sent!

You will receive a message once the land owner makes a decision.
LAND_TRADE.OFFER_TOO_SOON: You've issued an offer for this land recently! If the offer has been declined, please wait for an hour before trying again.
LAND_TRADE.OVERVIEW:
You can offer any of your resources to another player in exchange for one of their lands. If your offer is accepted then the selected land will become yours (base levels will not be affected). If the offer is declined your resources will be returned.

To select a land for purchase simply tap on its flag or a building on the map.
LAND_TRADE.SELECT_LAND: Tap on another player's land marker to proceed...
LAND_TRADE.SELECT_RESOURCES: How many resources are you willing to offer?
LAND_TRADE.TITLE: Land Purchase
LAND_TRADE.TOO_MANY_OFFERS: You've issued too many offers already! Please wait for them to be accepted or withdraw one to proceed.

LOGIN_ERRORS.FORM: Please enter your login and password!

MISC.NO_CONNECTION_DESC: Please connect wi-fi or ensure that 3G/4G signal is available!

NOTIFICATIONS.ALLIANCE_INVITE: {{from_name}} offered to form an alliance with you. Check your "Alliances" tab to accept or decline this invite.
NOTIFICATIONS.ALLIANCE_TERMINATED: One of your alliances has been terminated! Check "Messages" for more details.
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_CAPTURED_LAND: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to {{defender_name}}'s land {{land_name}}! Land has been captured!
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DAMAGED_BASE: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to {{defender_name}}'s base: {{base_name}}! Base has lost {{levels}} level(s).
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DAMAGED_BUILDING: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to "{{building}}" based in {{defender_name}}'s {{land_name}}! {{building}} still stands.
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DAMAGED_LAND: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to {{defender_name}}'s land {{land_name}}!
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DESTROYED_BASE: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to {{defender_name}}'s base: {{base_name}}! Base destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DESTROYED_BUILDING: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to "{{building}}" based in {{defender_name}}'s {{land_name}}! Building destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_DESTROYED_LAND: Your army dealt {{damage}} damage to {{defender_name}}'s land {{land_name}}! Land destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.ARMY_INCOMING: Army of {{attacker_name}} is inbound and preparing to attack {{land_name}}!
NOTIFICATIONS.ATTACKER_CASUALTIES: While defending {{land_name}} your army has slain {{attacker_deaths}} soldier(s) of {{attacker_name}}.
NOTIFICATIONS.ATTACKER_DEFEATED: Army of {{attacker_name}} attacking {{land_name}} has been defeated! You are victorious!
NOTIFICATIONS.ATTACK_FAILED: Your army attacking {{land_name}} has been defeated! {{defender_name}} is victorious!
NOTIFICATIONS.ATTACK_LOSSES: Your army lost {{attacker_deaths}} soldier(s) while invading {{land_name}} of {{defender_name}}.
NOTIFICATIONS.ATTACK_RESULTS: Your army killed {{defender_deaths}} enemy soldier(s) while invading {{land_name}} of {{defender_name}}.
NOTIFICATIONS.BASE_DAMAGED: {{attacker_name}} used {{weapon}} to deal {{damage}} damage to your base: {{base_name}}! Base has lost {{levels}} level(s).
NOTIFICATIONS.BASE_DESTROYED: {{attacker_name}} used {{weapon}} to deal {{damage}} damage to your base: {{base_name}}! Base destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.BUILDING_DAMAGED: {{attacker_name}} used {{weapon}} to deal {{damage}} damage to "{{building}}" based in {{land_name}}! {{building}} still stands.
NOTIFICATIONS.BUILDING_DESTROYED: {{attacker_name}} used {{weapon}} to deal {{damage}} damage to "{{building}}" based in {{land_name}}! Building has been destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.CHECK_MESSAGES: Tap on "Messages" inside the main menu for more information.
NOTIFICATIONS.COMBAT_END_BRIEF: One of the ongoing battles has ended! Check "Messages" for details.
NOTIFICATIONS.COMBAT_STATS_DETAILS: Your army killed {{killed}} soldiers of {{enemy}} and lost {{lost}} of your own. Defending land received {{damage}} damage. Gained {{points}} {{translate_item}}.
NOTIFICATIONS.DEFENDERS_LOST: {{attacker_name}} has slain the defending army of {{land_name}}!
NOTIFICATIONS.DEFENDER_CASUALTIES: {{defender_deaths}} soldiers have been killed defending against {{attacker_name}} at {{land_name}}!
NOTIFICATIONS.INVITE_ACCEPTED: Your offer to form an alliance with {{with_name}} has been accepted!
NOTIFICATIONS.INVITE_DECLINED: Your offer to form an alliance with {{with_name}} has been turned down!
NOTIFICATIONS.INVITE_RECEIVED: Another player invited you to form an alliance. Check "Alliances" tab for more details.
NOTIFICATIONS.INVITE_UPDATE: A response to one of your alliance offers has just arrived! Check "Messages" for more details!
NOTIFICATIONS.LAND_DAMAGED: {{attacker_name}} dealt {{damage}} damage to your land {{land_name}} using {{weapon}}!
NOTIFICATIONS.LAND_DESTROYED: {{attacker_name}} dealt {{damage}} damage to your land {{land_name}} using {{weapon}}! Land destroyed!
NOTIFICATIONS.LAND_PURCHASED: You've purchased some land! Check "Messages" for more details.
NOTIFICATIONS.LAND_TAKEN: {{attacker_name}} dealt {{damage}} damage to your land {{land_name}} using {{weapon}}! Land has been captured!
NOTIFICATIONS.OFFER_DECLINED: One of your trade offers has been declined! Check "Messages" for details.
NOTIFICATIONS.RETREAT_DESC: Battle between {{attacker_name}} and {{defender_name}} is over! {{attacker_name}}'s army has retreated.
NOTIFICATIONS.SEASONAL_BONUS: Seasonal bonus received! Check messages for details.
NOTIFICATIONS.TRADE_REQUEST: Incoming trade request! Check "Trade Management" screen for details!
NOTIFICATIONS.TRADE_WITHDRAWN: One of the pending trade requests has been cancelled!
NOTIFICATIONS.UNOBTAINIUM_COLLECTED: Your weekly shipment of Unobtainium has arrived!
NOTIFICATIONS.UNOBTAINIUM_COLLECTED_DETAIL: Your weekly shipment of {{amount}} Unobtainium has arrived!
NOTIFICATIONS.UPDATE_RELOAD: Application has been updated to the latest version and will reload momentarily. This should only take a few seconds.

PAGE_ALLIANCES.ALLIANCE_TERMINATED: Alliance with {{with_name}} has been terminated! {{with_name}} is once again considered an enemy.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.ALREADY_ALLIED: This player is already allied with you.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.ALREADY_INVITED: You have already invited this player to an alliance recently! Please wait for them to respond.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.CREATE_DESC: Invite another player into an alliance. If that player accepts your invitation you will be unable to harm their lands and take over resource locations.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.DESCRIPTION: Alliances indicate friendly relationships with other players, preventing land damage to each other and resource takeover.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.INVITED_YOURSELF: You cannot invite yourself to an alliance!
PAGE_ALLIANCES.INVITE_ACCEPTED: Invitation accepted! You have formed a new alliance.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.INVITE_SUCCESSFUL: You will be notified as soon as the other party accepts your request.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.MISSING_INVITE: Invitation couldn't be found! Please try again later.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.MISSING_NAME: Please provide a display name of another player!
PAGE_ALLIANCES.MISSING_USER: Player with that name does not exist! Please check your spelling and try again.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.OTHER_INVITES: List of formed alliances and issued invitations:
PAGE_ALLIANCES.PENDING_INVITES: List of pending alliance invitations from other players:
PAGE_ALLIANCES.RECENTLY_REJECTED: This player decliend your invitation recently. Please try again later.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.TERMINATE_DESC: Terminating this alliance will make you enemy to that player, allowing them to damage your lands and take over resources.
PAGE_ALLIANCES.TITLE: Alliances
PAGE_ALLIANCES.USER_INACTIVE: This player hasn't logged in for a while. You can only form alliances with active players.

PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.ALREADY_FIGHTING: This base has already sent its army to battle! Please wait for this battle to finish or use army from another base.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.ARMY_COOLDOWN: Your army is still resupplying after the last battle! Please try again later.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.ATTACK_DESC: Your army has begun advancing towards the selected land! Check progress of this battle by tapping on the red combat marker or from "My Lands" -> "Army Controls" window.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.BASE_IN_COMBAT: Army of this base is in combat and cannot perform additional actions.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.MISSING_BASE: Base not found! Please try again later.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.MOVE_DESC: Please select a destionation base to which you would like to transfer your army.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.NEED_BASES: You don't have any other bases where you could transfer this army!
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.NO_ARMY: There is no army left on this base to transfer!
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.NO_ENEMIES: There are no targets within this base's reach!
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.TARGET_DESC: Please select enemy players to attack with your army.
PAGE_ARMY_VIEW.TITLE: Army Controls

PAGE_CHAT.DESCRIPTION: Please visit our forum for official guides, technical support and general enquiries.
PAGE_CHAT.DISCORD: If you prefer to talk in real-time please visit our Discord chat ran by players:
PAGE_CHAT.DISCORD_DISCLAIMER: Please note that discord channels are maintained and moderated by our community members and the Epic Dragon staff has no control over any content posted there. If you require a developer's help with the game, please post on the forum instead.
PAGE_CHAT.TITLE: Chat and Forum

PAGE_COMBAT.ALREADY_ATTACKING: Your base is already in combat! Please wait for the battle to finish and try again.
PAGE_COMBAT.ATTACK_DESC:
Stationed army from the nearest base will be sent to invade this land. Free-standing lands can be captured when they reach level 1 if no defenders are left. Bases can only be damaged up until level 1.

This will be considered an act of war, making your bases visible to enemies for 24 hours.
PAGE_COMBAT.MISSING_ARMY: You do not have an army stationed nearby to attack! Build or transfer some troops to the nearest base and try again!
PAGE_COMBAT.MISSING_BASE: Cannot attack this land: you do not have a base nearby!
PAGE_COMBAT.MISSING_TARGET: No targets left! You are victorious!
PAGE_COMBAT.RETREAT_SUCCESSFUL: Your army has successfully retreated back to base.
PAGE_COMBAT.SELECT_LAND: Tap on another player's land marker to attack that land...
PAGE_COMBAT.TARGETING_ALLY: You cannot attack your ally! Please choose another target or terminate the alliance.
PAGE_COMBAT.TITLE: Combat in Progress
PAGE_COMBAT.UNTARGETABLE_BASE: This base cannot be attacked at this time!

PAGE_CONSTRUCT.ARMY_MOBILISED: +{{amount}} units have been mobilised and assigned to their current base.
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.ERROR_NO_LAND: No nearby land detected for construction!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.ERROR_OPTION_EXISTS: This structure is already at maximum level!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.ERROR_STILL_BUILDING: Cannot upgrade: construction is still in progress!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.LIST_HEADER: Select a base to view construction options.
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.MAX_ARMY: This base cannot have more than {{amount}} troops stationed within!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.NO_LANDS: You do now have any lands nearby. You need to capture a piece of land first!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.NO_OPTIONS: There is nothing to build here currently. Capture more lands and check this section again later!
PAGE_CONSTRUCT.TITLE: Construct

PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.ALLOW_ACCESS: Please allow Domination: Earth to use the device location to capture the surrounding lands!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.ALLY_LAND: Land capture blocked by {{name}}! You cannot capture friendly lands: either terminate the alliance or buy the blocking land using "Purchase Land" on Earth View!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.AVAILABLE_STATION: This resource station hasn't been claimed yet! Capture its land to begin collecting resources from this location.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_BUILT: Your new land has reached level {{level}}: a new base has been built!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_BUILT_DESCRIPTION: To advance your base you need to capture new lands within 100km by tapping the flag button again. Using it while inside the base will temporarily improve its defences.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.COMPLETE_OBJECTIVES: Complete all objectives to find out more about other elements of the game.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_DAMAGED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to the base of {{lands_title}}. The base has lost {{levels}} level(s).
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_DEFENCE: Your presence on a base increased its defences by {{amount}} points for 2 hours! Check in again within that time to stack defence points and reset the countdown!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_DESTROYED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to the base of {{lands_title}}. The base has been destroyed.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_LEVELUP: Your base has advanced to level {{level}}!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BASE_TOO_CLOSE:
Cannot capture this land: your base is too close!
Please move at least 200 meters away and try again!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BUILDING_DAMAGED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to the {{building}} of {{lands_title}}. {{building}} still stands.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.BUILDING_DESTROYED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to the {{building}} of {{lands_title}}. {{building}} has been destroyed.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CAPTURED_RESOURCE_ALREADY: A nearby source of {{resource}} still belongs to you. Gained +{{amount}}.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CAPTURED_RESOURCE_ENEMY: A nearby source of {{resource}} is owned by a higher-level enemy! Upgrade your land to take over this resource location.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CAPTURED_RESOURCE_SOURCE: Сaptured a source of {{resource}}! Gained +{{amount}} and unlocked collection of this resource!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CAPTURE_RESULT_NEED_LAND: Cannot pick up stations: you need to capture land nearby to connect resource to your base!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CAPTURE_TOO_SOON: You've already captured a piece of land in the last 15 minutes! Please try again later.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.CREATED_RESOURCE: New resource appeared in the area: {{resource}} ({{amount}})!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.DEPLOY_BASE: Please deploy your base using the flag button first!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.ENEMY_BLOCKED:
A nearby enemy land is higher than yours by {{level}} levels:
you must be of the same level or higher to collect resources!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.ENEMY_DAMAGED:
You have dealt {{level_damage}} level damage to {{damaged}} enemy land(s)!
{{removed}} enemy land(s) have been completely eradicated.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.FIRST_BASE_DESCRIPTION:
Press the flag button below to deploy your first base required for resource collection.
Make sure it's in an area you can visit frequently!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.INVALID_LOCATION: This location cannot be captured! Please move to another spot or try again later!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_CAPTURED_LINKED:
You have captured a new piece of land: {{name}}!
It has been linked with your nearby base.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_CAPTURED_NEW:
You have captured a new piece of land: {{name}}!
You don't have a base close by, but after upgrading this land to level 5 a new base will be built!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_DAMAGED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to a land of {{lands_title}}.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_DESTROYED: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to a land of {{lands_title}}. The land has been completely eradicated.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_LEVELUP: Your nearby land "{{name}}" has advanced to level {{level}}!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_LEVELUP_AWARD:
Your nearby land "{{name}}" has advanced to level {{level}}!
Linked base is one step closer to the next level!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_MAX_LEVEL:
Your land is at maximum possible level.
Further captures will only collect resources and damage enemies within its radius.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_MINIMUM: Land of {{name}} is at the lowest possible level and cannot be damaged further! Use army to capture this land.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_PROTECTED: Land of {{name}} is protected by an attack structure!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_TAKEN: Your {{weapon}} dealt {{damage}} points of damage to a land of {{lands_title}}. The land has been captured and belongs to you now!.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MERGED_BUILDINGS: Your base received {{levels}} level up point(s) from buildings on "{{source_name}}".
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MERGE_DESC: Land "{{source_name}}" merged with "{{award_name}}" increasing its level to {{award_level}}!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MISSING_LEVELS: To advance this land you need to construct {{need_levels}} more building(s) or upgrade the existing buildings by that amount.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MULTIPLE_RESOURCES: A group of resources located close to each other.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.NOTHING_TO_PICKUP: There are no resources around to pick up!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.PERMISSION_REQUIRED: This game is using GPS to capture lands, view surroundings and pick up resources. Please allow access to location services to play!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.PICKUP_TOO_SOON: You've just attempted to pick up resources! Please wait a couple of seconds and try again.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.RESOURCE_ITEM: Capture land around this resource to collect it.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.RESOURCE_TIP_DESCRIPTION: Every land capture creates a new resource somewhere in the area. To collect that resource you need to stand next to it and press the hand button!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.SHARED_RESOURCE: {{name}} has shared {{amount}} {{resource}} with you while collecting resources nearby!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.TAP_FOR_DETAILS: Tap on an option for details
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.TITLE: Earth View
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.YOU_ARE_HERE:
You are here!
Moving around in the real world updates this position in the game.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_TOO_FAR: Selected land is too far away!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.FOLLOWING_CAMERA: Camera will now follow your current position...
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MAGNET_DESC: You can merge any lower-level lands existing within or adjacent to the selected land to increase its level. This land has to meet building and cost requirements of the level it is about to become.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.LAND_NEARBY: Cannot upgrade this land as a higher level land is nearby: {{name}}! Select {{name}} and merge smaller land with it using the "Magnet" button.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.SMALLER_LAND_NEARBY: Cannot upgrade this land as another land is nearby: {{name}}! Use the "Magnet" button to merge these lands.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.EMPTY_MERGE: No adjacent lower-level lands found for merging!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.MERGE_SUCCESS: {{number}} land(s) merged with {{name}} successfully increasing its level to {{level}}!
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.PLACEMENT_DESC: Tap on a free spot within your captured land to place the selected building.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.PLACEMENT_ERROR: Must be at least 50m away from the border or other structures.
PAGE_EARTH_VIEW.DELETE_DESC: You can destroy an existing building if you misplaced it or just no longer want it. Please note that this action is permanent and cannot be reversed.

PAGE_EXCHANGE.DESCRIPTION: You can exchange Unobtainium for the selected resource at the rate listed below.
PAGE_EXCHANGE.EXISTING_ORDER: This order has already been processed! Please contact support@domination.earth if you haven't received purchased items.
PAGE_EXCHANGE.MISSING_PREMIUM:
You do not have any Unobtainium!


You can purchase some on the "Construct" tab by clicking on the green plus button underneath the Unobtainium icon.
PAGE_EXCHANGE.NOT_ENOUGH: You do not have enough Unobtainium for this transaction!
PAGE_EXCHANGE.NO_RATE: Unobtainium cannot be exchanged for this resource!
PAGE_EXCHANGE.TITLE: Exchange for
PAGE_EXCHANGE.WEEKLY_DESCRIPTION: units of Unobtainium will be deposited to your account every 7 days from the moment of subscribing.

PAGE_INVENTORY.ACTIVATED_MAX: You've already activated maximum amount of items!
PAGE_INVENTORY.ACTIVATE_DESC: Once activated this item's effect cannot be disabled. After the effect wears off the item will disappear.
PAGE_INVENTORY.ALREADY_ACTIVE: This item has already been activated!
PAGE_INVENTORY.DELETE_DESC: Are you sure you would like to permanently delete this item?
PAGE_INVENTORY.DEPOSIT_DESC: Would you like to transfer this item from your inventory into storage?
PAGE_INVENTORY.NOT_BASE: You cannot activate items so close to your base! Please leave the base territory and try again.
PAGE_INVENTORY.NO_ITEMS: You do not possess any items currently. Build an Assembly Plant on one of your bases to produce tools and power-ups.
PAGE_INVENTORY.NO_STORED_ITEMS: No items are stored at this location currently.
PAGE_INVENTORY.TITLE: Items and Power-ups
PAGE_INVENTORY.WITHDRAW_DESC: Would you like to transfer this item from storage to your inventory?
PAGE_INVENTORY.UPGRADE_DESC: Would you like to add one more inventory slot?

PAGE_MENU.USER_EXPIRED: Your session has expired! Please "Sign Out" and log back in again!

PAGE_MESSAGES.DESCRIPTION: Most recent notifications are listed below. Tap on a message to see what it relates to on a map.
PAGE_MESSAGES.TITLE: Messages

PAGE_MY_LANDS.ATTACK_DESC:
Target all enemy lands within the radius, damaging any defensive structures first. If the target land has no buildings left you will be damaging its levels. Level 1 lands can be captured using an army.

This will be considered an act of war, making your bases visible to enemies for 24 hours.
PAGE_MY_LANDS.COLLECTION_TIMER: There's nothing to collect yet! Please wait for another {{time}} seconds and try again!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.ERR_BASE_CLOSE: Cannot move base to this location: another base is already within a 100km radius!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.INVALID_LOCATION: Your location cannot be identified! Please move around and try again. If the issue persists, please reboot your device and make sure that Location Services are enabled.
PAGE_MY_LANDS.INVENTORY_FULL: You are carrying too many items! Please free up at least {{amount}} more inventory slots!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.MOVE_DESC: You can relocate the selected base to your current position, preserving its levels, structures and lands. Make sure you are standing in the right spot, as the move will happen instantly!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.NOT_BASE: You must be present on the selected building's base to proceed!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.NO_COLLECTION: You possess no sources of any resource yet! Capture a land around at least one source to enable collection.
PAGE_MY_LANDS.NO_NEED_REPAIR: This structure is already at maximum health!
PAGE_MY_LANDS.REPAIR_DESC: Keeping your buildings at maximum health is important, as when the health reaches zero this structure will be destroyed and require constructing from scratch again.
PAGE_MY_LANDS.TITLE: My Lands
PAGE_MY_LANDS.WAREHOUSE_FULL: Your warehouse needs {{amount}} more slots to store this item!

PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_BARRACKS:
Construct Barracks


Construct Barracks on your base to unlock recruitment of an army.

Armies allow attacking other players' lands and bases remotely (within a 100km radius around your base) and are the only way to attack someone's base. Bases can only be reduced to level 1.

Attacking army deals damage to all offensive and defensive structures once every 10 minutes and when everything is destroyed it begins reducing your opponent's land levels. If the land reaches level 1 it will be captured and linked to your base.

Each combat can last up to 2 hours.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_BASE:
Building First Base


Press "Capture Land" (the round flag button on "Earth View") to deploy your first base.

Make sure you can visit its location again in the future, as your presence on a base unlocks certain features like item production and ability to boost defences.

Don't worry if you've accidentally placed your base in a wrong spot, it can be moved once again to another place from "My Lands" later.

Your bases are permanent and cannot be completely destroyed by an enemy, only reduced to level 1. They also remain invisible until you attack another player, in which case all bases are revealed for 24 hours.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_DEFENCE:
Build Defences


Visit "Construct" tab and build any wall on your base or any of the captured lands.

Each time a non-allied player captures a piece of land in the territory that belongs to you your land will take 1 point of level damage whenever your opponent's land is the same or higher level than yours.

Defensive structures absorb this damage (up to the number of their Hit Points which can be repaired later) and prevent your lands from shrinking. Additionally, when your enemy uses an army to invade your lands defensive structures increase the chance of your army to survive in combat: 2 points of Defence increase the survival chance for each soldier by 1%.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_FIRST_CAPTURE:
Capture New Land


Move outside of your base's land and use "Capture Land" again to acquire new territory.

Every time you capture a new piece of land your base advances towards the next level. Base levels increase the limit of resources you can collect and army units you can station there (100 per base level including levels from all bases in your possession, x10 of that amount for Money resource).

If you use "Capture Land" within an existing land that land will expand: upgrades like that also advance your base in the same way as new territories.
"Capture Land" can only be used once every 15 minutes.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_RESOURCES:
Collect Resources


You need resources for construction of any kind: find at least one unit of Money, Supplies and Personnel.

Most resources appear on the world map every time someone captures a piece of land. You need to travel to their location and capture land around that resource to pick it up. Sometimes you will encounter resource stations (such as Oil Rigs, Supply Factories and Recruitment Beacons): capturing these will unlock the ability to "Collect Resources" remotely from "My Lands" once every hour.

Money
Appears almost anywhere in the world. Can also be obtained by scrapping real-world items via the "Scrap Items" tab.

Supplies
Supplies appear mostly outside of cities and villages: look out for supply sources in forests, deserts, near lakes and anywhere else outside of the populated areas.
Can also be obtained by scrapping items or by building a Supply Factory.

Personnel
Mostly appears inside cities, towns and villages. Can very rarely be found in the wilderness and never while scrapping items.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_UPGRADE:
Building Upgrades


Visit "Construct" tab and upgrade any of the existing buildings.

Upgrades allow improving a building's offensive and defensive capabilities, increasing its hit points, damage and other attributes. Supply Factory upgrades increase the amount of supplies collected.
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.STAGE_WORLD:
Capture the World


Now that you're familiar with core mechanics of "Domination: Earth" you are ready to take on the world!

Create new bases by capturing a new land further away from your primary base than 100km and upgrade it to level 5. After that you can transfer armies between your new bases to clear out the surrounding areas and expand your global influence. Alternatively, you can establish alliances with the locals and proceed peacefully!

Good luck!
PAGE_OBJECTIVES.TITLE: Current Objective

PAGE_PROFILE.TITLE: My Profile
PAGE_PROFILE.AUTO_UPGRADE_SETTING: Upgrade lands within 50m instead of capturing new

PAGE_REFERRAL.DESCRIPTION: Get someone you referred to scan your QR code using the "Scrap Items" facility and they will receive a resource bonus. You will receive extra resources whenever their base reaches level 3 and every time your friend establishes a new base. You may also scan each other's QR codes at any time instead of regular bar codes for an increased resource gain.
PAGE_REFERRAL.NOTES: Please note: both parties have to be using their own unique devices. Referral system will not work if you are scanning a photo of someone's code from a device to which this code belongs.
PAGE_REFERRAL.RESOURCE_RECEIVED: Received {{amount}} {{resource}} for being referred by an existing player!
PAGE_REFERRAL.TITLE: Refer a friend

PAGE_SCRAP_ITEMS.ALLOW_ACCESS: Please allow Domination: Earth to use the device camera to scan and scrap items!
PAGE_SCRAP_ITEMS.ERROR_SCRAPPED: This item has already been scrapped in the last 24 hours!
PAGE_SCRAP_ITEMS.NO_CHARGES: Cannot do that yet: no charges remain!
PAGE_SCRAP_ITEMS.OVERVIEW:
Any real-world items that have a barcode can be "scrapped" into resources:
simply press "Scrap items" and focus your camera on a barcode.
PAGE_SCRAP_ITEMS.CHARGES_RESET: Used charges reset in 24 hours after the first attempt.

PAGE_PERKS.TITLE: Perks
PAGE_PERKS.DESCRIPTION: Peacekeeping Points awarded for fighting the Force of Terror unlock new perks and upgrades.
PAGE_PERKS.ERROR_MAX: This perk is already at maximum level!

PERK.RADIUS_DESC: Increases basic resource collection radius in meters. Works in addition to any item bonuses.
PERK.METAL_DESC: Increases lifetime of all activated Metal Detectors (in minutes).
PERK.BULLHORN_DESC: Increases lifetime of all activated Bullhorns (in minutes).
PERK.RADIO_DESC: Increases lifetime of all activated Radio Transmitters (in minutes).
PERK.MAGNET_DESC: Increases lifetime of all activated Super Magnets (in minutes).
PERK.EXTRA_MONEY_DESC: Additional Money units received upon collection from the map.
PERK.EXTRA_SUPPLIES_DESC: Additional Supplies received upon collection from the map.
PERK.EXTRA_PERSONNEL_DESC: Additional Personnel units received upon collection from the map.
PERK.DEFENCE_DESC: All army units receive additional defence bonus regardless of their surroundings.
PERK.TERROR_DESC: Army deals additional points of damage against any non-player enemies and lands of terror.
PERK.DROP_DESC: Small chance for an additional resource spot to appear in the area after each land capture, containing resource of which you have the least.
PERK.STATION_DESC: Upon capturing any resource station its remaining lifetime will increase by the specified number of days.
PERK.BASE_DESC: Increases defence bonus received for checking-in on a base and raises the associated defence limit.
PERK.SCRAP_DESC: Multiplies resource rewards received from scrapping by the specified amount.

PAGE_CAPTURE_BUILD.TITLE: Utility Structures
PAGE_CAPTURE_BUILD.DESCRIPTION: You are standing on a maximum level land that can only grow by merging with the adjacent lands. However, Land Capture allows placing a new utility structure within your captured territory or upgrade one in a 50m radius.
PAGE_CAPTURE_BUILD.NO_ACTION: {{translate_item}} is at full health and cannot be repaired further!

PAGE_UPDATE.TITLE: New Update
PAGE_UPDATE.DESCRIPTION: A new version of the game is available containing latest fixes and enhancements! This update is required for all features to work correctly.

PAGE_WARS.TITLE: Wars
PAGE_WARS.DESCRIPTION: Attacking other players starts a war that lasts 7 days. After the war ends all participants can no longer see or interact with each other unless a truce is requested.
PAGE_WARS.NO_ALLIANCE: Cannot create alliances with war enemies! Request truce from the "Wars" window and try again!
PAGE_WARS.SURRENDER_DESC: Surrendering will end the war instantly preventing any further attacks or interactions with enemy player. However, this will count as a defeat regardless of your victory points accumulated so far.
PAGE_WARS.SURRENDER_NOTIFY: {{name}} has surrendered! The war is over!
PAGE_WARS.VICTORY_NOTIFY: War with {{name}} has ended. You are victorious!
PAGE_WARS.DEFEAT_NOTIFY: War with {{name}} has ended. You have been defeated!
PAGE_WARS.WAR_END_BRIEF: One of the ongoing wars has ended! Check "Messages" for details.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_DESC: If approved by your enemy truce will restore their visibility and invalidate results of this war. While the truce lasts it is impossible to attack each other or initiate another war, but you can arrange a rematch afterwards.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_DURATION: Please select the number of days for the truce to last
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_SENT: Truce offer issued! Please wait for the other party to respond.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_PENDING: Truce request is already pending for this war! Check "Truce" tab for details.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_NOTIFY: {{name}} offered to make a truce! Open "Wars" - "Truce" tab to accept or decline this offer.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_INCOMING: You have received a truce offer! Check "Messages" for details.
PAGE_WARS.AWAITING_ACTION: Awaiting for response from the other party...
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_DECLINED_DETAIL: {{name}} has turned down your truce offer!
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_RESPONSE: One of your truce offers received a response! Check "Messages" for details.
PAGE_WARS.NO_WARS: You are not at war with anyone currently.
PAGE_WARS.NO_ENDED_WARS: There are no victories or defeats to display.
PAGE_WARS.NO_TRUCE: No truce requests are active right now.
PAGE_WARS.TRUCE_BLOCK: You cannot attack {{name}} as you have an active truce with them!

PAGE_LEADERBOARDS.NOT_LISTED: Your score isn't listed in Top 100.

PAGE_TUTORIAL.STEP1_DESC: Capture lands & collect resources travelling in the real world.
PAGE_TUTORIAL.STEP2_DESC: Build your base, defend against terrorists and invade enemies.
PAGE_TUTORIAL.STEP3_DESC: Build the biggest army and conquer the world!
